text: 22 seats in the restaurant. 1 high chair for baby. Bilingual service. 10x better than stopping at McDonald's. Vegetarian mushroom gravy for the poutine if desired. "Made with love" the chef will happily tell you.
Awesome pizza, VERY fresh toppings and fast friendly service. Most pizza is greasy, but this is filling yet fresh and healthy. Look forward to trying some of the other items on delivery!
So far we tried the gyro's and Poutine and couple of Pogo's, Everything was Amazing! Will definitely go back!
